results.content: This website-building course is probably the best you can enrol for. The instructor was clear and concise with everything he explained, he didn't ramble on about anything, and having listened to and watched his lectures, I can confidently say I feel like a pro. I used to study computing and coding at school, although I did not have room to squeeze it on my "want to do for GCSE" list. Thank you so much for taking the time to provide this course!
